title: Zoo animals in the wild: ostriches
creator_credit: Mel Waskin, Bill Walker and Coronet Films
brief_description: The ostrich is the tallest and heaviest of all bird species, using its feet and sharp talons to protect itself against other animals. Shows the courting behaviour of the male and female ostrich as well as the care of the young. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Mel Waskin, Bill Walker and Coronet Films
